author: davidb
msg: Update transaction itests dependencies on transaction modules to current version.
The itests were referring to old SNAPSHOT versions.
This fixes a build error on trunk.

author: davidb
msg: Update blueprint itests dependency on blueprint-core to the current version
It was previously pointing at the old 1.4.0-SNAPSHOT which is not being built any more.
This fixes a build error on trunk.
